modules.npcText:
The guard's back stiffens, his face reddened with rage. "It seems you have yet to learn your manners, filth. Today, I will be your teacher!"
Spinning around to face you, the guard grabs your worn-out shirt and pulls you into the bars of the cell door, slamming your head into them.
The collision turns your vision white. For a brief second, you see cities engulfed in flame, dark silhouettes trapped beneath rubble, and all manner of creatures, intelligent and animal alike, dying of illness.
These are not your memories, and you know not of the people you saw in this vision.
Suddenly, knowledge beyond your being floods your mind.
